CustomField.description: The Legal Sex of an individual based on their drivers license, passport, or government ID. Options include Female, Male, X-Other or Unspecified. Data Cookbook: https://stthomas.datacookbook.com/institution/terms/280317
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The Legal Sex of an individual based on their drivers license, passport, or government ID. Options include Female, Male, X-Other or Unspecified. This is different then Gender Identity.
CustomField.label: Legal Sex
